name: Path Of Sin
description:
PATH OF SINS

Hello there, my name is unknown to you, mortals, and I want to apologize for all the bad karma you have suffered. First, you overslept on your work. Secondly, you let my host passed through the security..  And finally, you didn’t install protection to your co-workers at NAF inc. and nearby innocents. Yeah, it sounds very bad for you because it will automatically make you a bad sinner. However, a good friend of mine, the Almighty True Evil, has insisted to give you another chance to redeem yourself. And so, I decided to make you go through this gruesome trail, the Path of Sins! Once you pass the trail, my friend will like to see you in person. Good Luck!
